title: Bloomberg Markets: Doty Says Powell 'Safe Choice'
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Doty Says Powell 'Safe Choice'
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Bryce Doty\u0010Senior Portfolio Manager\u0010SIT Investments\u0010Discussing President Donald Trump nominating Jerome Powell, as the new Federal Reserve Chair. Doty says if the desire was to truly continue current Fed policy, Janet Yellen would have been reappointed.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
